data.name: Album_FullPhysicalPath_Ex_Msg
data.value: DirectoryName must be empty for the root album. It was "{0}"

data.name: Album_Inflate_Ex_Msg
data.value: Album.Inflate() was invoked on an existing, not inflated album (IsNew = false, IsInflated = false), which should have triggered the Factory.LoadAlbumInstance() method to set IsInflated=true and HasChanges=false. Instead, this album currently has these values: IsInflated={0}; HasChanges={1}.

data.name: Album_Remove_Ex_Msg
data.value: The specified IGalleryObject is not a child of this album, and thus cannot be removed. Album ID = {0}; Gallery Object ID = {1}; Gallery Object parent album ID = {2}

data.name: DisplayObject_FileInfo_Ex_Msg
data.value: Invalid media asset file location: The media asset {0} is not located in the following directories that are valid for album {1}: {2}; {3}; {4}

data.name: Factory_CreateGalleryServerRoleInstance_Ex_Msg
data.value: Cannot create role: A role already exists with the name you entered.

data.name: Factory_LoadAlbumInstance_Ex_Msg
data.value: It is not valid to call LoadInstance(IAlbum album) when the album is already inflated and inflateChildMediaObjects=false.

data.name: GalleryObject_GalleryObjectType_Ex_Msg
data.value: Cannot change the GalleryObjectType property of a gallery object once it has been assigned. Current value = {0}; attempted to assign {1}.

data.name: GalleryObject_IsInflated_Ex_Msg
data.value: This gallery asset is already inflated. It cannot be inflated again.

data.name: GalleryObject_Parent_Ex_Msg
data.value: It is invalid to set the Parent property to null. If no valid object is available, set it to a NullGalleryObject instead.

data.name: GalleryObject_ValidateSave_Ex_Msg
data.value: Cannot save an existing object unless it has been fully inflated from the data store.

data.name: GalleryObjectCollection_FindById_Ex_Msg
data.value: The galleryObjectType parameter must be either GalleryObjectType.Album or GalleryObjectType.MediaObject. The value specified was {0}.

data.name: GenericMediaObject_Inflate_Ex_Msg
data.value: The Factory.LoadGenericMediaObjectInstance(IGalleryObject) method should have set IsInflated=true and HasChanges=false. Instead it currently has these values: IsInflated={0}; HasChanges={1}.

data.name: GenericThumbnailImage_Image
data.value: ..\Resources\GenericThumbnailImage_Image.png;System.Drawing.Bitmap, System.Drawing, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a
data.comment: A bitmap of a PNG image that can be used as a generic thumbnail image for images. The image is the standard icon used in Windows XP to represent images such as PNG and GIF.

data.name: HelperFunctions_ValidateDirectoryName_Ex_Msg
data.value: One or both arguments contain an empty string. dirPath = "{0}"; dirName = "{1}"

data.name: HelperFunctions_ValidateFileName_Ex_Msg1
data.value: One or both arguments contain an empty string. dirPath = "{0}"; fileName = "{1}"

data.name: HelperFunctions_ValidateFileName_Ex_Msg2
data.value: Gallery Server does not support files without an extension. (fileName = "{0}")

data.name: Image_Inflate_Ex_Msg
data.value: The Factory.LoadImageInstance(IGalleryObject) method should have set IsInflated=true and HasChanges=false. Instead it currently has these values: IsInflated={0}; HasChanges={1}.

data.name: MimeType_Ctor_Ex_Msg
data.value: Invalid MIME type: "{0}". The MIME type must be valid (e.g. "image/jpg", "video/quicktime").

data.name: MimeType_LoadInstances_Ex_Msg
data.value: No MIME type found for file extension = {0} and browserId = "default". Verify the configuration file contains an entry at //galleryServerPro/galleryObject/mimeTypes/mimeType that specifies this file extension and browser ID, and make sure it appears BEFORE any mimeType entries that specify a more specific browserId for this file extension.

data.name: SynchronizationStatus_CurrentFileIndex_Ex_Msg
data.value: CurrentFileIndex must be an integer between 0 and TotalFileCount - 1. Attempted to assign CurrentFileIndex = {0}; TotalFileCount = {1}.

data.name: SynchronizationStatus_TotalFileCount_Ex_Msg
data.value: TotalFileCount must be an integer greater than or equal to zero. Attempted to assign TotalFileCount = {0}.

data.name: Video_Inflate_Ex_Msg
data.value: The Factory.LoadVideoInstance(IGalleryObject) method should have set IsInflated=true and HasChanges=false. Instead it currently has these values: IsInflated={0}; HasChanges={1}.

data.name: Audio_Inflate_Ex_Msg
data.value: The Factory.LoadAudioInstance(IGalleryObject) method should have set IsInflated=true and HasChanges=false. Instead it currently has these values: IsInflated={0}; HasChanges={1}.

data.name: Virtual_Album_Title
data.value: ALL ALBUMS
data.comment: <2007.12.08> The title given to an album that exists only as a container for other albums and media assets (for example, to contain search results).

data.name: Metadata_ColorRepresentation_sRGB
data.value: sRGB

data.name: Metadata_ColorRepresentation_Uncalibrated
data.value: Uncalibrated

data.name: Metadata_ExposureCompensation_Suffix
data.value: step

data.name: Metadata_ExposureTime_Units
data.value: sec.

data.name: Metadata_FocalLength_Units
data.value: mm

data.name: Metadata_Height_Units
data.value: px

data.name: Metadata_SubjectDistance_Units
data.value: meters

data.name: Metadata_Width_Units
data.value: px

data.name: SynchronizationStatus_Disabled_File_Type_Msg
data.value: Disabled file type
data.comment: <2008.10.07> This is assigned to the value of the KeyValuePair object added to the ISynchronizationStatus.SkippedMediaObjects list when a file is encountered during synchronization that has a disabled file type. This value ends up being displayed to the user in the web UI at the completion of a synchronization.

data.name: Reduced_Functionality_Mode_Watermark_Text
data.value: Trial Version Expired. Enter License Key.

data.name: SynchronizationStatus_Hidden_File_Msg
data.value: Hidden file
data.comment: <2008.10.27> This is assigned to the value of the KeyValuePair object added to the ISynchronizationStatus.SkippedMediaObjects list when a file is encountered during synchronization that has the hidden file attribute. This value ends up being displayed to the user in the web UI at the completion of a synchronization.

data.name: DirectoryNotFound_Ex_Msg
data.value: The path {0} was not found. Check that the gallery is correctly configured and the path exists. Note: If you create a directory to resolve this error, you may have to restart the IIS application pool to get IIS to discover the directory.
data.comment: <2010.10.12> This is the message displayed when a directory path cannot be found.

data.name: DotNet_3_Or_Higher_Not_Found_Ex_Msg
data.value: Info: The .NET Framework 3.0 or higher is not installed on the server. It is not required but additional functionality, such as improved image metadata extraction, become automatically enabled when it is present.

data.name: SynchronizationStatus_Hidden_Directory_Msg
data.value: Hidden directory
data.comment: <2010.10.12> This is assigned to the value of the KeyValuePair object added to the ISynchronizationStatus.SkippedMediaObjects list when a directory is encountered during synchronization that has the hidden attribute. This value ends up being displayed to the user in the web UI at the completion of a synchronization.

data.name: Root_Album_Default_Summary
data.value: Welcome to Gallery Server
data.comment: <2016.04.20> Default summary of root album. Make sure it does not contain an apostrophe (').

data.name: Root_Album_Default_Title
data.value: ALL ALBUMS
data.comment: <2010.10.12> Default title of root album. Make sure it does not contain an apostrophe (').

data.name: Error_Default_Gallery_Object_Album_Invalid_Ex_Msg
data.value: Default Gallery Asset Album Invalid: The gallery '{0}' has an album ID specified ({1}) as the default gallery asset and it does not match an existing album. Review this setting in the administration area.

data.name: Error_Default_Gallery_Object_MediaObject_Invalid_Ex_Msg
data.value: Default Gallery Asset Media Asset Invalid: The gallery '{0}' has a media asset ID specified ({1}) as the default gallery asset and it does not match an existing media asset. Review this setting in the administration area.

data.name: Error_User_Album_Parent_Invalid_Ex_Msg
data.value: User Album Parent Invalid: The gallery '{0}' has an album ID specified ({1}) as the user album container and it does not match an existing album. Review this setting in the administration area.
data.comment: <2010.10.12> This setting is also in the resource file in the web layer.

data.name: SynchronizationStatus_Restricted_Directory_Msg
data.value: Cannot access directory

data.name: SynchronizationStatus_Loading_Album_Msg
data.value: Loading existing album '{0}'...
